CustomTileSplitter.description: Splits large images or latents into smaller tiles with overlap for processing. Supports batch and list outputs.

tile_size.name: Tile Size
tile_size.tooltip: Resolution of each tile in pixels. Power of 2 (e.g., 512, 1024) is recommended.

overlap.name: Overlap
overlap.tooltip: Number of overlapping pixels between adjacent tiles to prevent seams.

0.name: Tiles (Batch)
0.tooltip: All image tiles stacked into a single batch tensor.

1.name: Tiles (List)
1.tooltip: List of individual image tiles (useful for loop processing).

2.name: Latent Tiles (Batch)
2.tooltip: All latent tiles stacked into a single batch.

4.name: Tile Config
4.tooltip: Configuration data required by the Merger node to rebuild the image.

CustomTileMerger.description: Merges processed tiles back into a full image/latent using smooth weighted blending.

tile_config.name: Tile Config
tile_config.tooltip: The configuration output from the Splitter node.

blend_mode.name: Blend Mode
blend_mode.tooltip: Algorithm used to blend overlapping areas.

feather_percent.name: Feather (%)
feather_percent.tooltip: Percentage of the overlap area used for blending transition.

processed_tiles_image.name: Processed Image Tiles
processed_tiles_image.tooltip: The list or batch of processed image tiles to merge.

processed_tiles_latent.name: Processed Latent Tiles
processed_tiles_latent.tooltip: The list or batch of processed latent tiles to merge.
